          <title>
            <string language="sl">Podatek, bit, zlog, vhodne enote</string>
            <string language="en">Data, bit, byte, input units</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Daten, Bit, Byte, Inputmaßeinheiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Données, bit, octet, unités d'entrée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dados, bit, byte, unidades de entrada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dati, bit, byte, unità d'entrata</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στοιχεία, δυαδικό ψηφίο, οκτάδα, μονάδες εισόδου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Datos, dígito binario, octeto, unidades de 
entrada de información</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učitelj poenostavi predstavo podatka, bita, zloga in vhodnih enot Učenec se bo predstavljal in razumel pojme kot so bit, zlog in podatek Učenec bo razumel pojem podatek.</string>
            <string language="en">Lesson plan on teaching about computer data, bits, bytes and input units.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">podatek</string>
            <string language="en">data</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">bit</string>
            <string language="en">bit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zlog</string>
            <string language="en">byte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vhodna enota</string>
            <string language="en">input unit</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan auf dem Unterrichten über 
Computerdaten, Bits, Bytes und Inputmaßeinheiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de leçon sur enseigner au sujet des 
données d'ordinateur, des bits, des octets et des unités d'entrée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta da lição em ensinar sobre dados do 
computador, bits, bytes e unidades de entrada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma di lezione sull'istruzione circa i dati
del calcolatore, i bit, i byte e le unità d'entrata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος για τη διδασκαλία για τα στοιχεία 
υπολογιστών, τα μπιτ, τις οκτάδες και τις μονάδες εισόδου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plan de la lección en la enseñanza sobre datos 
del ordenador, dígitos binarios, octetos y unidades de entrada de 
información.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Daten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
